Text:
I am Ensign Alan Aylward. Captain of SRT Unit 1
It was suddenly organized as a combat unit.
Since expectations are high, let's do our best.

Lines: I'm Corporal Hoa Blanchett, and I'm the unit's operator.
I collect, analyze, and communicate information so that
you can concentrate on the battle. I'll do my best.
DeepL_mtl: I'm Corporal Hoa Blanchett, and I'm the unit's operator.I collect, analyze, and communicate information so thatyou can concentrate on the battle. I collect, analyze, and communicate information so thatyou can concentrate on the battle.
Text:
I'm Corporal Hore Blanchett, and I'm the unit's operator.
We collect, analyze, and communicate information so that
you can concentrate on the battle. I'll do my best.

Lines: I'm Sergeant Dennis Barrow. I think I'm the only one with
actual combat experience in this unit.
Thank you for your continued support, especially you cuties
DeepL_mtl: I'm Sergeant Dennis Barrow.I think I'm the only one withactual combat experience in this unit.Thank you for your continued support, especially you Thank you for your continued support, especially you cuties.
Text:
I'm Sergeant Dennis Barrow
I think I'm the only one with actual combat experience in this unit
Thank you for your continued support, especially you cuties.
Hahaha… Dennis, I'll be counting on you.

Jeez… 
I got transfered to such a weird unit...

I'm Warrant Officer Lil Somers from Augusta.
Although I have no actual combat experience
I'm quite skilled at piloting MS.

Well, I think I'll be poached for the elite forces soon.
In meantime, I'll be in your care.

Augusta means test pilot... That seems promising
Thank you for your support, lets get along.

Hmph! I have no intention of becoming familiar with you! 
"Nice" to meet you...
Hehehe...I'm relieved to see so many fun people.

Lines: Well, there are many people, including myself, who have
no actual combat experience. You have high potential, so
with experience we'll make great team.
DeepL_mtl: Well, there are many people, including myself, who haveno actual combat experience. you have high potential, sowith experience we'll make a great team.
Text:
Well, there are many people, including myself, who have no actual combat experience.
They are members with high potential, so as long as they gain experience,
We should be able to make a good team.

First of all, we will complete this mission perfectly and
I'll prove to you that I'm a right choice!
Now, everyone, get ready to sortie!
